channel.title: attack.t1001.003 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1001.003 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: DNSCat2 Powershell Implementation Detection Via Process Creation
item.description: The PowerShell implementation of DNSCat2 calls nslookup to craft queries. Counting nslookup processes spawned by PowerShell will show hundreds or thousands of instances if PS DNSCat2 is active locally.

item.title: Suspicious ADSI-Cache Usage By Unknown Tool
item.description: Detects the usage of ADSI (LDAP) operations by tools. This may also detect tools like LDAPFragger.

item.title: Suspicious LDAP-Attributes Used
item.description: Detects the usage of particular AttributeLDAPDisplayNames, which are known for data exchange via LDAP by the tool LDAPFragger and are additionally not commonly used in companies.
